Good Comments: Speedy and Reliable, good quality too
Subs were alright and the subs came out/were done fast. Only negative is that they didn't bother to sub the OP :(
Speedy and accurate.  Done by fans for fans.
The translation was perfect with great font styles to fit with what needed to be said. Even included extra notes for things some otaku's like me didn't know.
Accurate translations, nice fonts, but best of all they have very useful and non-obstructive translation notes where you need them. Better than a.f.k
Bad Comments: Compared to a.f.k, Guerrand is faster. They doesn't let the subtitle override character's face. Also more accurate, in episode 20 a.f.k even translate "chuugoku" as German
Fast and accurate. Does not sub the OP, but then who cares.
Really glad they took over since A.F.K. is MIA
Really quick on translations, and usually subbed within the same date of airing.
better translation and soft subs ftw
Really messy, and not so good as A.F.K. stupid-looking pictures before the Anime starts. Really... who needs that? I only want good translation and that something they don't have.
